column4: hello. I've been having this issue. See when I switch resolution up from 1024.768 the top panel won't go over to the edge of the screen. It only goes over 1024 pixels and the rest is dead space. this quirk would be ok, if it didn't wreak havoc with the video players. totem shows only black until you drag the window past the end of the panel, and vlc won't fullscreen properly
Screen 0: minimum 320 x 200, current 1280 x 864, maximum 1280 x 1200
do the resolution thing, and tell me what refresh are you at?
though in preferences the screen resolution manager says I'm at 1152x864@75hz
try messing with preferences screen resolution
just the resolution or refresh rate too?
I only have one option at 1152 (75Hz) and 1280(60hz). in both the top bar only goes 1024 over then stops. restarting or making new bars doesn't change this behavior
might be you need a better driver.
as for the binary drivers, are you sure a 9200 falls under that need?
